elements.title: Soony Saad (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Soony Saad (pictured) scored on his Major League Soccer debut on his 19th birthday?

elements.title: the Peninsula New York (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that to comply with a law that restricted liquor sales near churches, the Peninsula New York placed its cocktail lounge up a flight of stairs and down a long hallway?

elements.title: Shigeru Ohmori (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Shigeru Ohmori and his team took half a year to design the grass in Pokémon Sword and Shield?

elements.title: Translation Bureau (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in 2019, the Canadian government's Translation Bureau began providing translation services in Dene, East Cree, Plains Cree, and Mohawk?

elements.title: Robert Rattenbury (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Robert Rattenbury said to his student Geoffrey Kirk: "Good Heavens! Well, I don't suppose I shall be seeing you again"?

elements.title: Botaş Saros FSRU Terminal (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the construction of the Botaş Saros FSRU Terminal in the Gulf of Saros, Turkey, continued despite a court-ordered stay of execution?

elements.title: Rudy Nappi (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that illustrator Rudy Nappi based his cover art for the Nancy Drew Mystery Stories on summaries provided by his wife, who actually read the books?

elements.title: Fucking Trans Women (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Fucking Trans Women associates erectile dysfunction with pleasure?
